alert.note: Alert for Las Animas; Otero; Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 5:30PM MDT until June 16 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Otero County in southeastern Colorado... North central Las Animas County in southeastern Colorado... Southeastern Pueblo County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 600 PM MDT. * At 530 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles west of Delhi, or 36 miles northeast of Trinidad, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Delhi around 540 PM MDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
